Everyday benefits
🎯

Goal-oriented app

Trying to lose fat? Eat a more nutrient dense diet? We’ll keep you on track.

🦄

Nutrient dense recipes

Enjoy +150 professional curated recipes fit for your goals or create your own.

🔄

Food equivalents

How much fruit can you have and stay under your carb limit? We’ll tell you.

⏰

Fasting timer

What you eat matters, but when you eat is also very important. Find a pattern that works for you.

🧠

Free expert consult

Nearly everyone has questions about nutrition so please have a chat with our PhD’s - they’re here to help!

🧪

Cutting-edge food scores

Nutrita’s food scores help you follow a ketogenic diet, eat nutrient dense and keep insulin low for health and longevity.

Don’t just take our word for it

While you are in isolation, avoid piling on weight or eating a nutrient poor diet.... now might be the best time to nourish your body. #beigefree https://t.co/KuZxAqAt18

— The Fat Controller 🟥 (@itsjillgardner) March 23, 2020

Awesome App...use it daily to balance my nutritional needs. https://t.co/zVRdMkBvhS

— _ErnieB (@8899Eb) March 18, 2020

I had been reading about Nutritia. Loved the insulin Index and keto scores. Wonderful app.

— 🦊 Alejandro Ricciulli (@Zwandro) March 18, 2020

How does the 7-day trial work?

Cancel at any time in your account settings. You won't be charged if you cancel before 28 Apr 2019.

How do I pay for your service?

At the end of your free trial, you will be charged automatically in order to continue to use the service. You can choose between Monthly and Yearly billing. We accept credit & debit cards, PayPal, Google Pay, and Apple Pay.

How can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your plan anytime. When your subscription period expires, you will lose access to your Nutrita account.

I have a different question…

Explore our Help Center, or just ask via e-mail at hello@nutrita.app

Can I recover an expired account?

You can recover an expired account by buying a plan and re-access everything you've been tracking. Your data will remain intact for 14 days.

How does the 7-day trial work?

Cancel at any time in your account settings. You won't be charged if you cancel before 28 Apr 2019.

How do I pay for your service?

At the end of your free trial, you will be charged automatically in order to continue to use the service. You can choose between Monthly and Yearly billing. We accept credit & debit cards, PayPal, Google Pay, and Apple Pay.

How can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your plan anytime. When your subscription period expires, you will lose access to your Nutrita account.

I have a different question…

Explore our Help Center, or just ask via e-mail at hello@nutrita.app

Can I recover an expired account?

You can recover an expired account by buying a plan and re-access everything you've been tracking. Your data will remain intact for 14 days.

Diet

Low-carb

Carnivore
40% carbs / 30% protein / 30% fat

Why asking me these details

Your personal information are used to give you detailed guidance and interpretation of your nutrition. To make sure you get reliable data from your tracking, it's important to give as accurate information as possible. Your physical settings are never public, only you can see them.

Activity level

Sedentary
Desk job and little to no exercise
Lightly Active
Light exercise 1–3 days/week
Moderately Active
Moderate exercise 3–5 days/week
Very Active
Hard exercise 6–7 days/week
Extremely Active
Hard daily exercise and physical job or training

Waist

|
cm

How-To

Your waist is situated just after the top of your hip bone. If you don’t have a tape measure at home, use your earbuds cable and wrap your waist with it. Compare the lenght measured with a A4 paper sheet. A A4 measures 21.0 × 29.7 centimeters.

Recipe title

This is recipe heaven for those who don’t like to cook. Healthy easy avocado boats filled with tuna mayo, prawn cocktail or a baked egg with bacon bits. Keto, Paleo low-carb heaven.

8 mn.

Prep time

10 mn.

Cook time

Ingredients

  • Food title on one single line

    1.9 x cup. Chopped

    • Keto score Good

      7/10

    • Nutrient Density Moderate

      7/10

    • Insulin Index Moderate

      7/10
    •

  • Food title on one single line

    1.9 x cup. Chopped

    • Keto score Good

      7/10

    • Nutrient Density Moderate

      7/10

    • Insulin load Moderate

      7/10

  • Food title on one single line

    1.9 x cup. Chopped

    • Keto score Good

      7/10

    • Nutrient Density Moderate

      7/10

    • Insulin Index Moderate

      7/10
    •

Recipe

Step 1
Mix the tuna and mayonnaise and any spices you like, add to the centre of the avocado boat.
Step 2
Sprinkle with salt and cracked pepper.
Step 3
Crack an egg into the hollowed out centre of the avocado. Bake at 180C/350F for 10 minutes, or until the egg is cooked to your preference.

Help

How invitations work

Every time a new Nutrita Premium user signs up with your invitation code, they'll get a discount on their first trip (value amounts vary by location).

Once they start their first month of premium subscription, you'll automatically get $US 5 off your next subscription payment.

Discounts register automatically and expire 90 days from their issue date.

Why asking me these details

Your personal information are used to give you detailed guidance and interpretation of your nutrition. To make sure you get reliable data from your tracking, it's important to give as accurate information as possible. Your physical settings are never public, only you can see them.

Food journal & progress charts

Get clarity on important questions. How often am I snacking? Do I have carb creep going on? How much high quality protein am I really getting? Am I truly eating a nutrient dense diet? And is my sleep honestly better or worse on this diet?

    • Set up your fasting window

Fasting timer for boosting metabolic flexibility

Snacking is out and intermittent fasting is in! Use our fasting timer to find the fasting window that best fits your schedule. It’ll help you lose weight, control blood sugar, boost fat burning and get a handle on you cravings. Keep in mind, how often you eat matters - it’s not all about calories.

Daily food recaps

Get useful stats about your diet and can visualize it over days, weeks and months: macronutrient breakdown, nutritional completeness, protein-to-energy ratio, fat-to-protein grams, calorie intake and more.

Create your dashboard

How is Nutrita different?

How is Nutrita different?

1 Goal driven 2 It’s not all about calories 3 Custom recipes 4 In-house food scores Explore Nutrita

Goal driven

Get results by setting goals you can hit consistently. Whether you want to lose fat, control blood sugar, build muscle mass or simply maintain your weight in a healthy manner you can do it with our full support. Sign up to our 7-day free trial to book a free 30min expert consult.

It’s not all about calories

Counting calories isn’t a good approach to fat loss or general health. No one can do it accurately enough long-term, it’s not sustainable, and it doesn’t address root cause issues like hormonal imbalance and metabolic dysfunction. Nutrita Pro tracks your calories but they don’t have to be your focus. We provide more informative measures of diet quality, like the keto score, dietary insulin load, nutrient completeness, protein-to-energy ratio and more.

Custom recipes

Nutrita applies it’s food scores to hundreds of delicious low-carb recipes created by our friend DitchTheCarbs. You can browse over a hundred nutrient dense recipes in line with your carb limit and protein target. It’s way easier to choose the right recipe when you know its keto score, insulin load and nutrient density score. So whether your style is getting creative in the kitchen or keeping it super simple, you’ll have tasty options to choose from.

In-house food scores

Nutrition tracking apps don’t do much except record food and count calories. So Nutrita’s team of scientists and engineers were compelled to do something way, way cooler. They used clinical data, their biochemistry expertise and computer learning to create 3 scores: the insulin score tells you how a food affects the hormone insulin, the keto score tells you what’s keto and what’s not, and the nutrient density score tells you how nourishing a particular food or recipe truly is.

Explore Nutrita

The best options, for you!

The best options, for you!

We made it easy to compare foods and recipes according to what matters to you. Looking for nourishing options? Our nutrient density score ranges from 0 to 10 and uses color-coded labels telling you if it’s Good, Bad or just Ok. Following a keto diet? Our keto score is on a 0 to 10 scale to take the guesswork out of staying keto. Battling insulin resistance or high blood sugars? Our insulin score goes from 0% to 100%, leaving little doubt as to the likely metabolic impact.

Banana

PER 100G

0 out of 10 Keto score Bad

4% protein

Not a good choice for ketogenic diets

Steak

PER 100G

8 out of 10 Keto score Good

64% protein

A great staple fatty food for ketogenic diets

Our expertise at your disposal

Everyone needs a little help and our team is here to support you.

Our expertise at your disposal

Everyone needs a little help and our team is here to support you.

Free 30min expert consult

Everyone who signs up to Nutrita Pro can book a free 30min consult with our in-house expert and co-founder Raphael Sirtoli. He can help you cut through the complicated and contradictory claims in health and nutrition scene. Ask your questions and get maximum value from Nutrita Pro.

Medically reviewed content

Knowledge is power and we want it to empower all our users, which is why all of our scientific content available for free. All of it is medically reviewed by the doctors on our board of advisors. Our team produces the highest quality scientific content on health and nutrition because of its wide range of expertise, covering medicine, scientific research, computer learning, science communication and design.

Disclaimer

The Service offers health, fitness and nutritional information and is designed for educational purposes only. You should not rely on this information as a substitute for, nor does it replace, professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. If you have any concerns or questions about your health, you should always consult with a physician or other health-care professional. Do not disregard, avoid or delay obtaining medical or health related advice from your health-care professional because of something you may have read on the Service. The use of any information provided on the Service is solely at your own risk.
